extendedInfo.description: Kids Radar is the best guide to finding educational games for kids!  Download now and get to discover the finest games for kids!Kids Radar has a team of educators that selects the best educational games and apps for kids aged 2 to 10 years.  Each app is sorted as per age, subject and price while also being rated on the learning and quality quotient.  This ensures that your child learns, while having great fun.Parents stop wasting endless time searching apps on Google Play â start using Kids Radar now!FEATURESâ¢	Parents can install loads of learning apps and games for their kidsâ¢	Parents can read our short description for each app to know the function and outcome of the gameâ¢	Apps are rated on the basis of learning potential and quality of each appâ¢	Parents can use the learning structure as a guide to install gamesâ¢	Apps are reviewed by childhood educators on various parameters- user interface and graphics, engagement & educational valueâ¢	Apps are tested by a panel of smart kids who love to play on mobile appsâ¢	Games for toddlers feature best phonics apps, learning math apps, preschool puzzles, coloring apps, drawing apps, rhymes for kids, tracing ABC, learning animal sounds and many other apps loved by kidsâ¢	Games for kindergarten kids feature best word spelling apps, learning to read apps, dress up games, arcade games, racing games, matching games, puzzles and many more educational appsâ¢	Games for 1st grade, 2nd grade, 3rd grade, 4th grade and 5th grade kids feature best vocabulary building apps, learning math apps on fractions & place value, reading games on grammar & spelling, brain games, action games, logic puzzles & mazesLEARNING STRUCTURE1.	Language	     Language Development	     Reading             Writing             World Languages2.	Maths             Numbers & Operations             Geometry             Measurement             Logic & Reasoning3.	Our World             Travel & Communication             Food & Health             The Living World             People of the World4.	Creativity & Fun             Patterns & Puzzles             Games             Art             Music5.	ReferenceWe believe that with the advent of the apps ecosystem, mobile devices can become powerful learning aids. Our aim is to enable parents to leverage the power of mobile devices in accelerating learning outcomes of their children.ALL ANDROID PHONES & TABLETS SUPPORT OUR APP
